snippet: The Milan Official Gazette of the 20th inst., publishes a proclamation of the Podestat announcing the arrival of the Emperor on the 21st, and ordering the inhabitants to decorate their houses on his passage....
lead_paragraph: The Milan Official Gazette of the 20th inst., publishes a proclamation of the Podestat announcing the arrival of the Emperor on the 21st, and ordering the inhabitants to decorate their houses on his passage.
